name: Alec Bradley - V2L Black - Gordo
additionalNotes: The Alec Bradley V2L Black uses a uniquely blended filler made of 2 Viso and 2 Ligero long-filler tobaccos from four of Honduras’ finest tobacco producing regions. This rare filler combination is encased by a Honduran binder, which is then covered by an enticing reddish Nicaraguan wrapper. Handmade in Honduras, the Alec Bradley V2L Black is perfect if you’re looking for a value-priced cigar that superbly balances strength and flavor
